channel.title: Create :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description: Create Route Now that we’ve explored the routes we can use to read data from our RESTful API, let’s look at the routes we can use to modify that data. The first one we’ll cover is the create route, which allows us to add a new entry to the database. However, before we do that, let’s create some helpful utility functions that we can reuse throughout our application as we develop more advanced routes.
